name: Alameda County Community Food Bank
description: Distributes millions of healthy meals each year to hungry families and individuals in Alameda County.

name: Crisis Support Services of Alameda County
description: Offers crisis intervention, suicide prevention, and emotional support services.

name: Alameda County Community Development Agency
description: Focuses on improving the quality of life for all residents by promoting economic opportunity, affordable housing, and community development.

name: Save the Bay
description: Dedicated to protecting and restoring San Francisco Bay for people and wildlife.

name: Alameda County Meals on Wheels
description: Delivers nutritious meals to homebound seniors to help them maintain their independence.

name: The East Bay SPCA
description: Provides comprehensive animal welfare services and finds loving homes for animals.

name: The Volunteer Center of the East Bay
description: Connects individuals and groups with volunteer opportunities to make a positive impact in the community.

name: Alameda County Community Legal Services
description: Provides free legal assistance to low-income individuals and families in Alameda County.

name: Alameda County Library Foundation
description: Supports the Alameda County Library system by raising funds for library programs and services.

name: Berkeley Humane
description: Rescues and finds loving homes for dogs and cats while promoting the welfare of animals.

name: Alameda County Community Health Center
description: Provides accessible, high-quality healthcare services to underserved populations in Alameda County.

name: East Bay Asian Local Development Corporation (EBALDC)
description: Strengthens communities by providing affordable housing, community development, and services.

name: Alameda County Foster Youth Alliance
description: Supports foster youth through mentoring, education, and advocacy to help them thrive.

name: The Alameda Point Collaborative
description: Helps homeless individuals and families stabilize their lives through housing and supportive services.

name: East Bay Sanctuary Covenant
description: Provides sanctuary, solidarity, support, and legal services to immigrants and refugees.

name: Alameda County Community Development Agency Housing Authority
description: Manages affordable housing programs and provides housing assistance to eligible residents.

name: Tri-City Health Center
description: Offers comprehensive healthcare services, including medical, dental, and behavioral health, to all residents.

name: Alameda County Resource Conservation District
description: Works to conserve and protect natural resources, including soil, water, and wildlife habitat.

name: Alameda County Meals on Wheels - Friendly Visitors Program
description: https://www.feedingseniors.org/wp-content/themes/mealsonwheels/images/logo.png
info: Provides social interaction and companionship to homebound seniors.

name: The Alameda County Deputy Sheriffs' Activities League
description: Engages at-risk youth through sports, mentorship, and educational programs.
